vote.text: Amendment SA 5107 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5107 proposed by Senator Fischer for Senator Udall. (consideration: CR S6287 text: CR S6287) To strike the preamble.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5107 proposed by Senator Fischer for Senator Udall.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5107 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
